name: VAN GOGH FEMURBONE EJECTION ANECDOTE
description:
ZIK PROBLY PRESENTS AN EVOLUTIONARY 3D, FIRST-PERSON EXPERIMENTAL SWORD-FIGHTING ROGUELIKE (KINDA) DIGITAL RECREATIONAL ENTERTAINMENT ACTIVITY, FOR EVERYONE TO SUFFER AND DEVOLVE INTO 1x1 LEGO BLOCKS

YOU WILL PLAY AS A RANDOM GUY WITH A SWORD

THANK YOU lhsfdajhaf

HOW TO PLAY :

  • WASD : MOVE
  • LEFT MOUSE : (HOLD) PREPARE SWING, (RELEASE) SWING
  • YOU CAN PARRY THE ENEMIES SWORD BY SWINGING AGAINS THEIR SWORDS
  • THE SAME APPLIES TO YOU, SO BEWARE.
  • THERE'S NO END; ONLY SUFFERING AWAITS.

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
